DOC.brief_summary: We intend to include10 patients in this study and trial. Prior to treatment they will sign an informed consent form, stating that they are acquainted with the surgical procedure and study, and that they consent to participate in the study. Five patients will undergo regular operation with Universal tibial reamed nail (AO-Synthes) using the fluoroscopy device: OEC 9800 (GENERAL ELECTRIC). five patients will undergo the same operation using the new navigation system:"The Guiding star" method. The allocation will be random.
DOC.brief_title: New Method for Distal Interlocking of Cannulated Intramedullary Nails
DOC.criteria: 1. Signing Informed consent. 2. Conscious patients. 1. Hemodynamic Instability. 2. Multiple system injuries. 3. Pregnancy. 4. Soldiers.
